sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-card>
    <v-form @submit.prevent="onSubmit"
            class="pa-4">
        <v-autocomplete
          v-model="newPlatform"
          :items="platformList"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="id"
          label="Add a new platform"
          >
        </v-autocomplete>
        <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" dense>Add</v-btn>
    </v-form>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
export default {
  name: "AddPlatform",
  inject: ["scenarioId"],
  props: {
    status: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      newPlatform: {},
      platformList: [],
      error: null
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getPlatformList() {
      let endpoint = `/api/platformnames/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "GET").then(data => {
        this.platformList = data.results;
      });
    },
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.newPlatform) {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
          name_id: this.newPlatform,
          scenario: this.scenarioId,
          status: this.status,
        }).then(data => {
          this.$emit("add-platform", data);
          this.newPlatform = null;
        });
        if (this.error) {
          this.error = null;
        }
      } else {
        this.error = "You must select a platform";
      }
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getPlatformList();
  }
};
</script>
